title: Artfest: where do we go from here
creator_credit: Gary Kildea, Esau Reuben and Papua New Guinea. Office of Information
brief_description: A film which looks at the determination, of the people of Papua New Guinea, to preserve their different cultures. Lifestyles have drastically changed with many people now living in the towns and leaving their village customs behind. This film concentrates on an arts festival which aimed to present traditional ideas and also to incorporate new ones.
